publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-6074 Claire Baker: Congratulations to Dundee College Staff and Students—That the Parliament congratulates staff and students at Dundee College who won the College of the Year Award at the annual Business to College Awards held in Our Dynamic Earth, Edinburgh, on 24 March 2010; further congratulates all colleges that were shortlisted, including Carnegie College and Adam Smith College in Fife; further congratulates the organisers of the Business to College Awards, Scotland’s Colleges; recognises the sponsors of the event, the Scottish Further and Higher Education Funding Council, and the contribution of the awards sponsors; considers that the Business to College Awards are an excellent opportunity to celebrate the many examples of how the college sector supports the business community, and recognises the contribution of colleges to the achievement of success for businesses throughout Scotland. Supported by: Marlyn Glen*, Des McNulty*, Mary Mulligan*, John Park*, Jackie Baillie*
S3M-6074 Congratulations to Dundee College Staff and Students (lodged on 26 March 2010) Ken Macintosh*, Pauline McNeill*, Karen Whitefield*
